document.full_text: japanese trade minister banri kaieda said on wednesday he would like a cabinet decision by the end of this week on tokyo electric power co's (tepco) compensation scheme for damages from its nuclear plant crisis.
document.title: japan trade minister wants tepco compensation decision this week
lines_and_colors: japanese trade minister banri kaieda said on wednesday he would like a cabinet decision by the end of this week on tokyo electric power co's (tepco) compensation scheme for damages from its nuclear plant crisis.
